description: Source file implementing APIs for LED management configuration, including functions for getting and setting string parameters, handling web configuration blobs encoded in base64, and interacting with LED data structures.

methods.name: LedManager_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves the string value of a parameter; specifically handles the 'Data' parameter by returning an empty string.

methods.name: LedManager_SetParamStringValue
methods.description: Sets the string value of a parameter, decoding base64-encoded data, and updating LED configuration or failover data accordingly.
